hackathon-description-text: Help us build an engaging app that brings together a community of users dedicated to helping this planet that we all share. Give individuals the ability to track their impact through Open source APIs, RFIDs, Drones, live streaming outlets and your imagination.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Technology Consultant, Startup Strategist, Founder - Lab Zed Consulting

hackathon-eligibility:
Everyone is welcome to our hackathon! 
We suggest that each team should consist of 1 dev, 1 designer and 1 creative.
However, teams are free to form the way they like.
hackathon-requirements:
The submissions can consist of IOS, Android or web based apps.
All submissions must be submitted on this platform by 1:59 PM on Sunday the 23rd please.
hackathon-rules:
Teams must start work from scratch at the hackathon and respect the given itinerary. 
All work submited will be uploaded on this platform and may be used by OneTreePlanted after the event. If OneTreePlanted chooses to use the work from our Hackathon, the hackers behind the idea will receive a proposal to continue the work if they're capable of completing the app.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 Rue Sherbrooke Ouest, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 51 Rue Sherbrooke Ouest, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: So you think you can hack - But can you save the world at the same time?
